'''v0.1.2 alpha''' is the first version released for iOS devices.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20200610114310/https://www.mojang.com/2011/11/minecraft-pocket-edition-on-ios/|title=Minecraft - ''Pocket Edition'' on iOS!|date=November 18, 2011}}</ref>

== Changes ==
* Third person view "Back Only" for all devices.
* Mirrored [[Controls#Touch|controls]] for left-handed players.
* In-game sound toggle.
* The license verification failure screen additionally contains the text "You need to be connected to the internet once while you start the game."

== Fixes ==
* Fixed stairs being invisible when located within a chunk section with no other blocks.

== Internal Version ==
The internal version of v0.1.2 alpha is 0.1.2(1025) and has a size of 1.57 MB.

== J-version ==
[[File:Pocket Edition v0.1.2j alpha.png|thumb|An image of the j version of v0.1.2 alpha]]
'''v0.1.2j alpha''' was released on Google Play on an unknown release date. The internal version is 0.1.2(1023) and has a size of 1.98 MB.

== J-version demo ==

[[File:Pocket Edition v0.1.2j alpha (Demo).png|thumb|The title screen of the j version demo]]A free J-version "lite" demo of v0.1.2 alpha was released on Google Play on an unknown release date. In mid-2014, it was removed from the Play/App stores. The internal version is the same as the j-version.

== Demo ==
* A free "lite" demo of v0.1.2 alpha was released on Google Play on an unknown release date.<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pw1xdNdyuWw|title=minecraft on sony ericsson xperia mini pro sk17i|author=sumitdeo1|website=YouTube|date=October 21, 2011}}</ref> In mid-2014, it was removed from the Play store. The internal version is not currently known.
* A free "lite" demo of v0.1.2 alpha was also released on the iOS App Store on November 21, 2011.
